1.1.name: wordpress/share-tamil
1.1.description:
I am TechTamil Karthik. I am happy to release this wordpress plugin for Tamil wordpress bloggers.

Tamil blog aggregator websites are very popular like Tamilmanam, Tamil 10, Indli. WP Share Tamil plugin helps you and your users to share blog posts directly from your blog to social networks & tamil sites. like Tamilmaman, Tamil 10, Indli, facebook, twitter, linkedin etc. This version of WP Share Tamil plugin supports following social networks & Tamil sites

Want to see LIVE DEMO? http://www.techtamil.com/computer-tips-tricks-in-tamil/wordpress-plugin-share-tamil/

  • TamilManam
  • Tamil 10
  • Indli
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • Linkedin
  • Stumbleupon
  • Digg
  • reddit
  • Evernote

You can 1. Enable/disable any of the above social shar
